text:
Question 116) Senufo mask, Mali. Wood and vegetable fiber. MAE/USP collection.
Plastic forms in African productions led modern artists from the early twentieth century, such as Pablo Picasso, to some artistic propositions called avant -garde. The mask refers to
A) Preservation of the proportion.
B) Idealization of the movement.
C) asymmetrical structuring.
D) synthesis of shapes.
E) aesthetic appreciation.
